**Droven chain mail** is a type of [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is always made of [shadowsteel](/wiki/Shadowsteel "Shadowsteel"), and appears as **crested black mail** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

Droven chain mail is the [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") for the [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") [Spidersilk](/wiki/Spidersilk_\(artifact\) "Spidersilk (artifact)").

## Generation

Droven chain mail is not randomly generated. [Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\)#dNetHack "Drow (starting race)") characters in roles that start with [leather armor](/wiki/Leather_armor "Leather armor") or a [cloak of magic resistance](/wiki/Cloak_of_magic_resistance "Cloak of magic resistance") will have it replaced with droven chain mail, and drow Bards generate with droven chain mail in place of the standard [leather cloak](/wiki/Leather_cloak "Leather cloak").

Most hedrow monsters [will generate with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") droven chain mail, including [hedrow wizards](/wiki/Drow_\(monster\)#Hedrow_wizard "Drow (monster)"), [hedrow master-wizards](/wiki/Hedrow_master-wizard "Hedrow master-wizard"), and [drow alienists](/wiki/Drow_alienist "Drow alienist"). [Yochlols](/wiki/Yochlol "Yochlol") can generate with droven chain mail in any form, and the various steeds generated alongside droven hunting parties have a 1⁄10 chance of generating with barded droven chain mail fitted to their body shape.

## Description

While worn, droven chain mail grants 2 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC"), 4 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and [MC2](/wiki/MC2 "MC2"), and also confers a bonus to spellcasting equivalent to wearing a [robe](/wiki/Robe "Robe") - this bonus stacks with the bonus from an actual worn robe. As shadowsteel armor, droven chain mail has a chance of evaporating in lit squares, with the chance reduced if the wearer has MC3 or [invisibility](/wiki/Invisibility "Invisibility") - [erodeproofed](/wiki/Erodeproof "Erodeproof") droven chain mail will repair partial evaporation while the wearer remains in an unlit square.

Droven chain mail is a type of body armor that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is always made of shadowsteel, and appears as crested black mail when unidentified.

Droven chain mail is the base item for the artifact Spidersilk.

Generation

Droven chain mail is not randomly generated. Drow characters in roles that start with leather armor or a cloak of magic resistance will have it replaced with droven chain mail, and drow Bards generate with droven chain mail in place of the standard leather cloak.

Most hedrow monsters will generate with droven chain mail, including hedrow wizards, hedrow master-wizards, and drow alienists. Yochlols can generate with droven chain mail in any form, and the various steeds generated alongside droven hunting parties have a 1⁄10 chance of generating with barded droven chain mail fitted to their body shape.

Description

While worn, droven chain mail grants 2 base AC, 4 DR and MC2, and also confers a bonus to spellcasting equivalent to wearing a robe - this bonus stacks with the bonus from an actual worn robe. As shadowsteel armor, droven chain mail has a chance of evaporating in lit squares, with the chance reduced if the wearer has MC3 or invisibility - erodeproofed droven chain mail will repair partial evaporation while the wearer remains in an unlit square.
